com.deepak.recentfilesapi

Interface RecentFileHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SampleWindow

    public interface RecentFileHandler
    This interface is to be implemented by any class which requires the recent files support

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onRecentFileSelection(java.io.File file, java.lang.String[] attributes)
      this function is called by the RecentFilesManager object when the user selects a recent file from the JMenu.

    • Method Detail

      • onRecentFileSelection

        boolean onRecentFileSelection(java.io.File file,
                            java.lang.String[] attributes)
        this function is called by the RecentFilesManager object when the user selects a recent file from the JMenu. The class which implements this interface should provide the methods of handling the file opening operation within this function implementation
        Parameters:
        file - the recent file that is selected
        attributes - the file attributes which the user have saved for the file
        Returns:
        true if the recent file is handled properly else return false. on returning false the RecentFileManager removes the file and its attributes from the recent files list
